thumb.name: Wonderful Moments Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday. Sandy!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHope your birthday%3Cbr%3Eis filled with%3Cbr%3Ewonderful moments!

thumb.name: You and Me Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYou and Me. way back when...%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday. Dana%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThe maturity level%3Cbr%3Ehasn't really changed%3Cbr%3Ea bit. has it?%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday%3Cbr%3Eto a Terrific Friend

thumb.name: Best Birthday Ever
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E'My best%3Cbr%3Ebirthday%3Cbr%3Ewould be%3Cbr%3Eif I could%3Cbr%3Ego to the%3Cbr%3Eamusement%3Cbr%3Epark and%3Cbr%3Estay there%3Cbr%3Efor my%3Cbr%3Ewhole life!'%3Cbr%3E%3Ci%3EAaron. Age 6%3C/i%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ENo matter how you spend it.%3Cbr%3ESharon.%3Cbr%3Ehope this is%3Cbr%3Eyour best Birthday ever!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Declaration of Celebration
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EA Declaration of Celebration%3Cbr%3Efor Sam%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIn honor of that%3Cbr%3E super-fantastic day%3Cbr%3E11 years ago today.%3Cbr%3Ewhen one%3Cbr%3E of The World's Greatest Kids.%3Cbr%3ESAM RESNOR.%3Cbr%3Ewas born.%3Cbr%3Ethis Declaration of Celebration%3Cbr%3Ehereby proclaims this date.%3Cbr%3EAugust 23. 2025.%3Cbr%3Eas the Official Day%3Cbr%3E to jump up and down%3Cbr%3E and yell and scream%3Cbr%3E and eat fun food%3Cbr%3Eand play fun games%3Cbr%3E and generally go crazy.%3Cbr%3Ecelebrating the birthday%3Cbr%3E of a really-and-truly great kid--%3Cbr%3EYou!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHave an extra-happy day!%3Cbr%3EAunt Sallie and Uncle George%3Cbr%3E(Official Signature)%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EOfficial%3Cbr%3E Seal%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: No Stopping You
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThe older.%3Cbr%3Ethe bolder.%3Cbr%3Ethe wiser.%3Cbr%3Ethe wilder.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThere's no stopping you.%3Cbr%3EChris!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHAPPY BIRTHDAY%3Cbr%3E
